header.devise: Building innovative web solutions, from front-end to back-end, with passion.

propos.partie1: Graduated with an MBA in full-stack development and enriched by my experience as an apprentice at Edissio, I am now seeking new professional challenges. My passion for software development, which began during my high school years, led me to specialize in this field that blends creativity and logic. Throughout my studies and professional experiences, I have had the opportunity to enhance my skills in both front-end and back-end development, while also gaining expertise in project management.
propos.partie2: In addition to my current expertise, I'm constantly seeking new knowledge to stay up-to-date in our ever-evolving field.
propos.partie3: When I'm not immersed in programming, you'll find me on the tennis court, enjoying time with my friends, or simply relaxing in front of a good film or video game.

innov-data.title: Full stack Developper
innov-data.description: Development of custom tools for external companies. Agile project management for iterative delivery. Quick adaptation to changes and continuous optimization of solutions

edissio.title: Web Developer Apprentice - Edissio
edissio.description: Development of a client area with Symfony. Creation of an emailing tool in PHP. Update existing sites and implement new features. Project management, time estimation and delivery.

lgc.title: C# Developer Internship - LGC
lgc.description: Developed a real-time listening program for ADAM-6051 modules, linked to production automation, to retrieve associated data. Then developed a heavy-duty software for displaying and analyzing the retrieved data.

springApi.title: Tennis Data API
springApi.description: Development of a REST API for managing tennis-related data, such as players, tournaments, championships, and clubs. It provides CRUD functionalities to facilitate the management and integration of this information into applications.

tcbc.title: TCBC Website
tcbc.description: Creation of the TCBC tennis club's showcase website. Realization of the specifications, the scoping note, a quote, and finally the site.

cowaf.title: Animal Carpooling Project
cowaf.description: Creation of a fictional animal carpooling startup and development of a polymorphic PWA application.

cyclo.title: Cycling Web Application
cyclo.description: Development of a web application to manage members and licenses, making this management more efficient and user-friendly for club board members.

phobie.title: Anti-Phobic Extension Project
phobie.description: Development of a web extension to hide images and videos corresponding to the user's phobia on a website. Creation of a DOM image analysis system with AI in Python.
